text: But I confess this to yoʋ, that according to the Way, which they call a sect, I serve the God of our fathers, believing everything that is 24:14 written throughout the Law and 78.4% ¦ in accordance with the law and that is written ANT CT 20.4% [Note: The Text und Textwert collation ignores a variant that affects the translation of this text. As a result, the percentages are not entirely accurate.]written throughout the Law and in the Prophets,
